   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Tests of application_opt() request_errors. There's some overlap
   23: %% between this suite and the traffic suite but latter exercises more
   24: %% config.
   25: %%
   26: 
   27: -module(diameter_3xxx_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: %% testcases, no common_test dependency
   30: -export([run/0,
   31:          run/1]).
   32: 
   33: %% common_test wrapping
   34: -export([
   35:          %% Framework functions
   36:          suite/0,
   37:          all/0,
   38:          init_per_suite/1,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          init_per_testcase/2,
   41:          end_per_testcase/2,
   42:          
   43:          %% The test cases
   44:          traffic/1
   45:         ]).
   46: 
   47: %% internal
   48: -export([send_unknown_application/1,
   49:          send_unknown_command/1,
   50:          send_ok/1,
   51:          send_invalid_hdr_bits/1,
   52:          send_missing_avp/1,
   53:          send_ignore_missing_avp/1,
   54:          send_5xxx_missing_avp/1,
   55:          send_double_error/1,
   56:          send_3xxx/1,
   57:          send_5xxx/1]).
   58: 
   59: %% diameter callbacks
   60: -export([peer_up/3,
   61:          peer_down/3,
   62:          pick_peer/5,
   63:          prepare_request/4,
   64:          handle_answer/5,
   65:          handle_error/5,
   66:          handle_request/3]).
   67: 
   68: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter.hrl").
   69: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter_gen_base_rfc6733.hrl").
   70: %% Use the fact that STR/STA is identical in RFC's 3588 and 6733.
   71: 
   72: -include("diameter_util.hrl").
   73: 
   74: 
   75: %% ===========================================================================
   76: 
   77: -define(testcase(), get(?MODULE)).
   78: 
   79: -define(L, atom_to_list).
   80: -define(A, list_to_atom).
   81: 
   82: -define(CLIENT, "CLIENT").
   83: -define(SERVER, "SERVER").
   84: -define(REALM, "erlang.org").
   85: -define(HOST(Host, Realm), Host ++ [$.|Realm]).
   86: 
   87: -define(ERRORS, [answer, answer_3xxx, callback]).
   88: -define(RFCS, [rfc3588, rfc6733]).
   89: -define(DICT(RFC), ?A("diameter_gen_base_" ++ ?L(RFC))).
   90: -define(DICT, ?DICT(rfc6733)).
   91: 
   92: -define(COMMON, ?DIAMETER_APP_ID_COMMON).
   93: 
   94: %% Config for diameter:start_service/2.
   95: -define(SERVICE(Name, Errors, RFC),
   96:         [{'Origin-Host', Name ++ "." ++ ?REALM},
   97:          {'Origin-Realm', ?REALM},
   98:          {'Host-IP-Address', [{127,0,0,1}]},
   99:          {'Vendor-Id', 12345},
  100:          {'Product-Name', "OTP/diameter"},
  101:          {'Auth-Application-Id', [?COMMON]},
  102:          {application, [{dictionary, ?DICT(RFC)},
  103:                         {module, ?MODULE},
  104:                         {answer_errors, callback},
  105:                         {request_errors, Errors}]}]).
  106: 
  107: -define(LOGOUT, ?'DIAMETER_BASE_TERMINATION-CAUSE_LOGOUT').
  108: 
  109: -define(XL(F),    ?XL(F, [])).
  110: -define(XL(F, A), ?LOG("D3XS", F, A)).
  111: 
  112: 
  113: %% ===========================================================================
  114: 
  115: suite() ->
  116:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 90}}].
  117: 
  118: all() ->
  119:     [traffic].
  120: 
  121: 
  122: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  123:     ?XL("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  124:         "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  125:     ?DUTIL:init_per_suite(Config).
  126: 
  127: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  128:     ?XL("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  129:         "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  130:     ?DUTIL:end_per_suite(Config).
  131: 
  132: 
  133: %% This test case can take a *long* time, so if the machine is too slow, skip
  134: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  135:     ?XL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> entry with"
  136:         "~n   Config: ~p"
  137:         "~n   => check factor", [Case, Config]),
  138:     Key = dia_factor,
  139:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
  140:         {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 10) ->
  141:             ?XL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> Too slow (~w) => SKIP",
  142:                 [Case, Factor]),
  143:             {skip, {machine_too_slow, Factor}};
  144:         _ ->
  145:             ?XL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> run test", [Case]),
  146:             Config
  147:     end;
  148: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  149:     ?XL("init_per_testcase(~w) -> entry", [Case]),
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: 
  153: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  154:     ?XL("end_per_testcase(~w) -> entry", [Case]),
  155:     Config.
  156: 
  157: 
  158: %% ===========================================================================
  159: 
  160: traffic(_Config) ->
  161:     ?XL("traffic -> entry"),
  162:     run().
  163: 
  164: 
  165: %% ===========================================================================
  166: 
  167: tc() ->
  168:     [send_unknown_application,
  169:      send_unknown_command,
  170:      send_ok,
  171:      send_invalid_hdr_bits,
  172:      send_missing_avp,
  173:      send_ignore_missing_avp,
  174:      send_5xxx_missing_avp,
  175:      send_double_error,
  176:      send_3xxx,
  177:      send_5xxx].
  178: 
  179: %% run/0
  180: 
  181: run() ->
  182:     ?XL("run -> entry"),
  183:     ?RUN([[{{?MODULE, run, [{E,D}]}, 60000} || E <- ?ERRORS,
  184:                                                D <- ?RFCS]]).
  185: 
  186: %% run/1
  187: 
  188: run({F, [_,_] = G}) ->
  189:     ?XL("run -> entry with"
  190:         "~n   F: ~p"
  191:         "~n   G: ~p", [F, G]),    
  192:     put(?MODULE, F),
  193:     apply(?MODULE, F, [G]);
  194: 
  195: run({E,D}) ->
  196:     ?XL("run -> entry with"
  197:         "~n   E: ~p"
  198:         "~n   D: ~p", [E, D]),
  199:     try
  200:         run([E,D])
  201:     after
  202:         ?XL("run(after) -> stop diameter app"),
  203:         ok = diameter:stop()
  204:     end;
  205: 
  206: run([Errors, RFC] = G) ->
  207:     ?XL("run -> entry with"
  208:         "~n   Errors: ~p"
  209:         "~n   RFC:    ~p", [Errors, RFC]),
  210:     Name = ?L(Errors) ++ "," ++ ?L(RFC),
  211:     ?XL("run -> start diameter app"),
  212:     ok = diameter:start(),
  213:     ?XL("run -> start service 'server' (~p)", [Name]),
  214:     ok = diameter:start_service(?SERVER, ?SERVICE(Name, Errors, RFC)),
  215:     ?XL("run -> start service 'client'"),
  216:     ok = diameter:start_service(?CLIENT, ?SERVICE(?CLIENT,
  217:                                                   callback,
  218:                                                   rfc6733)),
  219:     ?XL("run -> (server) listen"),
  220:     LRef = ?LISTEN(?SERVER, tcp),
  221:     ?XL("run -> (client) connect"),
  222:     ?CONNECT(?CLIENT, tcp, LRef),
  223:     ?XL("run -> run"),
  224:     ?RUN([{?MODULE, run, [{F,G}]} || F <- tc()]),
  225:     ?XL("run -> \"check\" counters"),
  226:     _ = counters(G),
  227:     ?XL("run -> remove 'client' transport"),
  228:     ok = diameter:remove_transport(?CLIENT, true),
  229:     ?XL("run -> remove 'server' transport"),
  230:     ok = diameter:remove_transport(?SERVER, true),
  231:     ?XL("run -> stop service 'server'"),
  232:     ok = diameter:stop_service(?SERVER),
  233:     ?XL("run -> stop service 'client'"),
  234:     ok = diameter:stop_service(?CLIENT),
  235:     ?XL("run -> done"),
  236:     ok.
  237: 
  238: %% counters/1
  239: %%
  240: %% Check that counters are as expected.
  241: 
  242: counters([_Errors, _RFC] = G) ->
  243:     [] = ?RUN([[fun counters/3, K, S, G]
  244:                     || K <- [statistics, transport, connections],
  245:                        S <- [?CLIENT, ?SERVER]]).
  246: 
  247: counters(Key, Svc, Group) ->
  248:     counters(Key, Svc, Group, [_|_] = diameter:service_info(Svc, Key)).
  249: 
  250: counters(statistics, Svc, [Errors, Rfc], L) ->
  251:     [{P, Stats}] = L,
  252:     true = is_pid(P),
  253:     stats(Svc, Errors, Rfc, lists:sort(Stats));
  254: 
  255: counters(_, _, _, _) ->
  256:     todo.
  257: 
  258: stats(?CLIENT, E, rfc3588, L)
  259:   when E == answer;
  260:        E == answer_3xxx ->
  261:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  262:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  263:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  264:      {{{0,275,0},recv},6},
  265:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  266:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  267:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  268:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  269:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  270:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  271:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  272:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  273:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},1}]
  274:         = L;
  275: 
  276: stats(?SERVER = Svc, E, rfc3588 = RFC, L)
  277:   when E == answer;
  278:        E == answer_3xxx ->
  279:     %% [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  280:     %%  {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  281:     %%  {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  282:     %%  {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  283:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  284:     %%  {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  285:     %%  {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  286:     %%  {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  287:     %%  {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  288:     %%  {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  289:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  290:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  291:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  292:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  293:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},1},
  294:     %%  {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  295:     %% = L;
  296:     ?XL("~w(~p, ~w) -> (attempt to) verify answer: "
  297:         "~n   E: ~p"
  298:         "~n   L: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Svc, RFC, E, L]),
  299:     Expected = [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  300:                 {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  301:                 {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  302:                 {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  303:                 {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  304:                 {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  305:                 {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  306:                 {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  307:                 {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  308:                 {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  309:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  310:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  311:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  312:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  313:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},1},
  314:                 {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}],
  315:     case L of
  316:         Expected ->
  317:             ?XL("~w(~w) -> ok", [?FUNCTION_NAME, RFC]),
  318:             L;
  319:         _ ->
  320:             ?XL("~w(~w, ~w) -> wrong: "
  321:                 "~n   L -- Expected: ~p"
  322:                 "~n   Expected -- L: ~p",
  323:                 [?FUNCTION_NAME, Svc, RFC, L -- Expected, Expected -- L]),
  324:             exit({wrong_answer, Svc, E, RFC})
  325:     end;
  326: 
  327: stats(?CLIENT, answer, rfc6733, L) ->
  328:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  329:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  330:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  331:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  332:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  333:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  334:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  335:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  336:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  337:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  338:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  339:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  340:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  341:         = L;
  342: 
  343: stats(?SERVER, answer, rfc6733, L) ->
  344:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  345:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  346:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  347:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  348:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  349:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  350:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  351:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  352:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  353:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  354:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  355:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  356:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  357:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  358:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  359:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  360:         = L;
  361: 
  362: stats(?CLIENT, answer_3xxx, rfc6733, L) ->
  363:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  364:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  365:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  366:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  367:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  368:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  369:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  370:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  371:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  372:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  373:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  374:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  375:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  376:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  377:         = L;
  378: 
  379: stats(?SERVER, answer_3xxx, rfc6733, L) ->
  380:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  381:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  382:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  383:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  384:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  385:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  386:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  387:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  388:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  389:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  390:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  391:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  392:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  393:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  394:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  395:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  396:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  397:         = L;
  398: 
  399: stats(?CLIENT, callback, rfc3588, L) ->
  400:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},1},
  401:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  402:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  403:      {{{0,275,0},recv},6},
  404:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  405:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  406:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  407:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  408:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  409:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  410:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},2}]
  411:         = L;
  412: 
  413: stats(?SERVER, callback, rfc3588, L) ->
  414:     [{{{unknown,0},send},1},
  415:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  416:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  417:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  418:      {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  419:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  420:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  421:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  422:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  423:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  424:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  425:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  426:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  427:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  428:         = L;
  429: 
  430: stats(?CLIENT, callback, rfc6733, L) ->
  431:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},1},
  432:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  433:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  434:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  435:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  436:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  437:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  438:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  439:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  440:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  441:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  442:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  443:         = L;
  444: 
  445: stats(?SERVER, callback, rfc6733, L) ->
  446:     [{{{unknown,0},send},1},
  447:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  448:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  449:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  450:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  451:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  452:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  453:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  454:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  455:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  456:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  457:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  458:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  459:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  460:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  461:         = L.
  462: 
  463: %% send_unknown_application/1
  464: %%
  465: %% Send an unknown application that a callback (which shouldn't take
  466: %% place) fails on.
  467: 
  468: %% diameter answers.
  469: send_unknown_application([_,_]) ->
  470:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  471:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3007,
  472:                                                  %% UNSUPPORTED_APPLICATION
  473:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  474:                                     'AVP' = []}
  475:         = call().
  476: 
  477: %% send_unknown_command/1
  478: %%
  479: %% Send a unknown command that a callback discards.
  480: 
  481: %% handle_request discards the request.
  482: send_unknown_command([callback, _]) ->
  483:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  484:     {error, timeout} = call();
  485: 
  486: %% diameter answers.
  487: send_unknown_command([_,_]) ->
  488:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  489:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3001,
  490:                                                  %% UNSUPPORTED_COMMAND
  491:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  492:                                     'AVP' = []}
  493:         = call().
  494: 
  495: %% send_ok/1
  496: %%
  497: %% Send a correct STR that a callback answers with 5002.
  498: 
  499: %% Callback answers.
  500: send_ok([_,_]) ->
  501:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  502:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5002,  %% UNKNOWN_SESSION_ID
  503:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  504:                        'AVP' = []}
  505:         = call().
  506: 
  507: %% send_invalid_hdr_bits/1
  508: %%
  509: %% Send a request with an incorrect E-bit that a callback ignores.
  510: 
  511: %% Callback answers.
  512: send_invalid_hdr_bits([callback, _]) ->
  513:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  514:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  515:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  516:                        'AVP' = []}
  517:         = call();
  518: 
  519: %% diameter answers.
  520: send_invalid_hdr_bits([_,_]) ->
  521:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  522:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3008, %% INVALID_HDR_BITS
  523:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  524:                                     'AVP' = []}
  525:         = call().
  526: 
  527: %% send_missing_avp/1
  528: %%
  529: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback answers.
  530: 
  531: %% diameter answers.
  532: send_missing_avp([answer, rfc6733]) ->
  533:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  534:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  535:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  536:                                     'AVP' = []}
  537:         = call();
  538: 
  539: %% Callback answers.
  540: send_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  541:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  542:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  543:                        'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  544:                        'AVP' = []}
  545:         = call().
  546: 
  547: %% send_ignore_missing_avp/1
  548: %%
  549: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback ignores.
  550: 
  551: %% diameter answers.
  552: send_ignore_missing_avp([answer, rfc6733]) ->
  553:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  554:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  555:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  556:                                     'AVP' = []}
  557:         = call();
  558: 
  559: %% Callback answers, ignores the error
  560: send_ignore_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  561:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  562:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  563:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  564:                        'AVP' = []}
  565:         = call().
  566: 
  567: %% send_5xxx_missing_avp/1
  568: %%
  569: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback answers
  570: %% with {answer_message, 5005}.
  571: 
  572: %% RFC 6733 allows 5xxx in an answer-message.
  573: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_, rfc6733]) ->
  574:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  575:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  576:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  577:                                     'AVP' = []}
  578:         = call();
  579: 
  580: %% RFC 3588 doesn't: sending answer fails.
  581: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_, rfc3588]) ->
  582:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  583:     {error, timeout} = call();
  584: 
  585: %% Callback answers, ignores the error
  586: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  587:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  588:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  589:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  590:                        'AVP' = []}
  591:         = call().
  592: 
  593: %% send_double_error/1
  594: %%
  595: %% Send a request with both an invalid E-bit and a missing AVP.
  596: 
  597: %% Callback answers with STA.
  598: send_double_error([callback, _]) ->
  599:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  600:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  601:                        'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  602:                        'AVP' = []}
  603:         = call();
  604: 
  605: %% diameter answers with answer-message.
  606: send_double_error([_,_]) ->
  607:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  608:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3008, %% INVALID_HDR_BITS
  609:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  610:                                     'AVP' = []}
  611:         = call().
  612: 
  613: %% send_3xxx/1
  614: %%
  615: %% Send a request that's answered with a 3xxx result code.
  616: 
  617: %% Callback answers.
  618: send_3xxx([_,_]) ->
  619:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  620:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3999,
  621:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  622:                                     'AVP' = []}
  623:         = call().
  624: 
  625: %% send_5xxx/1
  626: %%
  627: %% Send a request that's answered with a 5xxx result code.
  628: 
  629: %% Callback answers but fails since 5xxx isn't allowed in an RFC 3588
  630: %% answer-message.
  631: send_5xxx([_, rfc3588]) ->
  632:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  633:     {error, timeout} = call();
  634: 
  635: %% Callback answers.
  636: send_5xxx([_,_]) ->
  637:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  638:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5999,
  639:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  640:                                     'AVP' = []}
  641:         = call().
  642: 
  643: %% ===========================================================================
  644: 
  645: call() ->
  646:     Name = ?testcase(),
  647:     ?XL("call -> make diameter call with Name: ~p", [Name]),
  648:     %% There is a "bug" in diameter, which can cause this function to return
  649:     %% {error, timeout} even though only a fraction on the time has expired.
  650:     %% This is because the timer has in fact *not* expired. Instead what
  651:     %% has happened is the transport process has died and the selection
  652:     %% of a new transport fails (I think its a race causing the pick_peer
  653:     %% to return the same tranport process), at that error is converted to
  654:     %% a timeout error.
  655:     %% So, if this call returns {error, timeout} but only a fraction of the
  656:     %% time has passed we skip instead!
  657:     Timeout = 5000,
  658:     T1 = ?TS(),
  659:     case diameter:call(?CLIENT,
  660:                        ?DICT,
  661:                        #diameter_base_STR
  662:                        {'Termination-Cause' = ?LOGOUT,
  663:                         'Auth-Application-Id' = ?COMMON,
  664:                         'Class' = [?L(Name)]},
  665:                        [{extra, [Name]}, {timeout, Timeout}]) of
  666:         {error, timeout} = ERROR ->
  667:             T2 = ?TS(),
  668:             TDiff = T2 - T1,
  669:             if
  670:                 TDiff < 100 ->
  671:                     exit({skip, {invalid_timeout, TDiff, Timeout}});
  672:                 true ->
  673:                         ERROR
  674:             end;
  675:         R ->
  676:             R
  677:     end.
  678: 
  679: 
  680: %% ===========================================================================
  681: %% diameter callbacks
  682: 
  683: %% peer_up/3
  684: 
  685: peer_up(_SvcName, _Peer, State) ->
  686:     State.
  687: 
  688: %% peer_down/3
  689: 
  690: peer_down(_SvcName, _Peer, State) ->
  691:     State.
  692: 
  693: %% pick_peer/5
  694: 
  695: pick_peer([Peer], _, ?CLIENT, _State, _Name) ->
  696:     {ok, Peer}.
  697: 
  698: %% prepare_request/4
  699: 
  700: prepare_request(Pkt, ?CLIENT, {_Ref, Caps}, Name) ->
  701:     {send, prepare(Pkt, Caps, Name)}.
  702: 
  703: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_unknown_application) ->
  704:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  705:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:8/binary, 0:32, T/binary>>}
  706:         = Pkt
  707:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  708: 
  709:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H/binary, 23:32, T/binary>>};
  710: 
  711: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_unknown_command) ->
  712:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  713:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:5/binary, 275:24, T/binary>>}
  714:         = Pkt
  715:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  716: 
  717:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H/binary, 572:24, T/binary>>};
  718: 
  719: prepare(Pkt, Caps, T)
  720:   when T == send_ok;
  721:        T == send_3xxx;
  722:        T == send_5xxx ->
  723:     sta(Pkt, Caps);
  724: 
  725: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_invalid_hdr_bits) ->
  726:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  727:     %% Set the E-bit to force 3008.
  728:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:34, 0:1, T/bitstring>>}
  729:         = Pkt
  730:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  731:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H:34, 1:1, T/bitstring>>};
  732: 
  733: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_double_error) ->
  734:     dehost(prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_invalid_hdr_bits));
  735: 
  736: prepare(Pkt, Caps, T)
  737:   when T == send_missing_avp;
  738:        T == send_ignore_missing_avp;
  739:        T == send_5xxx_missing_avp ->
  740:     Req = sta(Pkt, Caps),
  741:     dehost(diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt#diameter_packet{msg = Req})).
  742: 
  743: sta(Pkt, Caps) ->
  744:     #diameter_packet{msg = Req}
  745:         = Pkt,
  746:     #diameter_caps{origin_host  = {OH, _},
  747:                    origin_realm = {OR, DR}}
  748:         = Caps,
  749:     Req#diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = diameter:session_id(OH),
  750:                           'Origin-Host' = OH,
  751:                           'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  752:                           'Destination-Realm' = DR}.
  753: 
  754: %% Strip Origin-Host.
  755: dehost(#diameter_packet{bin = Bin} = Pkt) ->
  756:     <<V, Len:24, H:16/binary, T0/binary>>
  757:         = Bin,
  758:     {SessionId, T1} = split_avp(T0),
  759:     {OriginHost, T} = split_avp(T1),
  760:     Delta = size(OriginHost),
  761:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<V, (Len - Delta):24, H/binary,
  762:                                 SessionId/binary,
  763:                                 T/binary>>}.
  764: 
  765: %% handle_answer/5
  766: 
  767: handle_answer(Pkt, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer, _Name) ->
  768:     Pkt#diameter_packet.msg.
  769: 
  770: %% handle_error/5
  771: 
  772: handle_error(Reason, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer, _Name) ->
  773:     {error, Reason}.
  774: 
  775: split_avp(<<_:5/binary, Len:24, _/binary>> = Bin) ->
  776:     L = pad(Len),
  777:     <<Avp:L/binary, T/binary>> = Bin,
  778:     {Avp, T}.
  779: 
  780: pad(N)
  781:   when 0 == N rem 4 ->
  782:     N;
  783: pad(N) ->
  784:     N - (N rem 4) + 4.
  785: 
  786: %% handle_request/3
  787: 
  788: handle_request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{application_id = 0},
  789:                                 msg = Msg},
  790:                ?SERVER,
  791:                {_, Caps}) ->
  792:     request(Msg, Caps).
  793: 
  794: request(undefined, _) ->  %% unknown command
  795:     discard;
  796: 
  797: request(#diameter_base_STR{'Class' = [Name]} = Req, Caps) ->
  798:     request(?A(Name), Req, Caps).
  799: 
  800: request(send_ok, Req, Caps) ->
  801:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps),
  802:                              errors = [5002]}};  %% UNKNOWN_SESSION_ID
  803: 
  804: request(send_3xxx, _Req, _Caps) ->
  805:     {answer_message, 3999};
  806: 
  807: request(send_5xxx, _Req, _Caps) ->
  808:     {answer_message, 5999};
  809: 
  810: request(send_invalid_hdr_bits, Req, Caps) ->
  811:     %% Default errors field but a non-answer-message and only 3xxx
  812:     %% errors detected means diameter sets neither Result-Code nor
  813:     %% Failed-AVP.
  814:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps)}};
  815: 
  816: request(T, Req, Caps)
  817:   when T == send_double_error;
  818:        T == send_missing_avp ->
  819:     {reply, answer(Req, Caps)};
  820: 
  821: request(send_ignore_missing_avp, Req, Caps) ->
  822:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps),
  823:                              errors = false}};  %% ignore errors
  824: 
  825: request(send_5xxx_missing_avp, _Req, _Caps) ->
  826:     {answer_message, 5005}.  %% MISSING_AVP
  827: 
  828: answer(Req, Caps) ->
  829:     #diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = SId}
  830:         = Req,
  831:     #diameter_caps{origin_host = {OH,_},
  832:                    origin_realm = {OR,_}}
  833:         = Caps,
  834:     #diameter_base_STA{'Session-Id' = SId,
  835:                        'Origin-Host' = OH,
  836:                        'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  837:                        'Result-Code' = 2001}.  %% SUCCESS
